# BCG Executive Perspectives

The *BCG Executive Perspectives* program offers innovative insights on global topics that matter most to today's leaders. Explore the current series guiding the C-suite through their AI transformation journeys and download our latest function-specific playbooks.

Tech + Us: Harness the power of technology and AI

## How AI-First Companies are Winning

Artificial intelligence: a topic that is both captivating and rapidly changing for industries and functions. With most sectors going through major shifts, CEOs are focused on how to leverage AI to fully transform organizations and create new sources of competitive advantage. In our newest series, we are sharing our experts' most recent insights to help CEOs navigate the complexity—and opportunity—at the sector level.

This series will address key questions on the minds of executives:

* How can I leverage AI to win with the new economic equation?
* What does an AI-first enterprise look like in my sector?
* What are leaders doing differently and how are they using AI solutions to accelerate their transformation?
* How do I get started…and how do I get this right?
